mapper.select: select prental_id, prental_de, prental_time_info, user_id, c.croom_id, c.croom_name from prental_info INNER JOIN classroom c on prental_info.croom_id = c.croom_id where c.croom_id = #{croom_id} and prental_de = #{prental_de}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prental_info prental_de, prental_time_info, user_id, croom_id VALUES(#{prental_de}, #{prental_time_info}, #{user_id}, #{croom_id})
